TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000I9Usc:ref

Hello Daniel,

Thank you for your reply.

I'm not available but one of my colleague can assist with this. We can schedule a remote session at 1:30 PM Turkey time.

Let me make an addition to the case. Turkey do not practice daylight saving time. I believe this issue started occurring at the end of October because of this.

Best Regards.
Subject: Netwrix Support Ticket #426658 - Time Zone Issue

TextBody:

Please let us know if this timeframe suits you .

Looking forward for your response.

Best regards,
